title: VA Rep. Abigail Spanberger, 2020
itunes:title: VA Rep. Abigail Spanberger, 2020
description:
Guests: Jordan Fabian, Bloomberg White House reporter, John Authers, Bloomberg Opinion columnist and Senior Editor for Markets, Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group, Mark Paustenbach, Democratic Strategist, and Senior Vice President at Rokk Solutions, and Rep. Abigail Spanberger, a Democrat representing Virginia's 7th Congressional district.


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
